alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 12:43PM CST until January 18 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1243 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Haughton, or 13 miles southeast of Bossier City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Castor, Jamestown, Ninock, Caspiana, Taylortown, Lake Bistineau South, Elm Grove, Robson, Mc Dade, Plum Orchard Landing and Koran. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Webster
